definitions.definition: In fortification : an indented parapet , formed by a series of rising members called cops or merlons , separated by openings called crenelles or embrasures , the soldier sheltering himself behind the merlon while he fires through the embrasure or through a loophole in the battlement.

main_definition: In fortification : an indented parapet , formed by a series of rising members called cops or merlons , separated by openings called crenelles or embrasures , the soldier sheltering himself behind the merlon while he fires through the embrasure or through a loophole in the battlement.
secondary_definitions: ( poetic ) The towering roof of heaven.
